titles.title: Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
To amend the Red River National Wildlife Refuge Act to modify the boundary of the Red River National Wildlife Refuge, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.
Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 117-615.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 443.

action.text: Mr. Grijalva moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 6427.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Red River National Wildlife Refuge Boundary Modification Act
This bill modifies the boundary of the Red River National Wildlife Refuge in Louisiana.
